title: Parse old versions of sdf files without warnings

content.raw:
Parsing an sdf file with an old version (currently anything earlier than 1.4) generates console warnings:
~~~
Warning [parser.cc:340] Converting a deprecated source[model.sdf].
Warning [Converter.cc:59]   Version[N] to Version[N+1]
~~~

Since we are providing backward compatibility through the `Converter` class, I think a warning message is not necessary. It also generates a lot of work upgrading models and world files in gazebo just so make the warnings go away when we do a version increment in sdformat.

I would propose converting these warnings to `sdfdbg`.
content.html:
Parsing an sdf file with an old version (currently anything earlier than 1.4) generates console warnings:

Warning [parser.cc:340] Converting a deprecated source[model.sdf].
Warning [Converter.cc:59]   Version[N] to Version[N+1]

Since we are providing backward compatibility through the Converter class, I think a warning message is not necessary. It also generates a lot of work upgrading models and world files in gazebo just so make the warnings go away when we do a version increment in sdformat.

I would propose converting these warnings to sdfdbg.
